      public void resetPassword(String email) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Resets the user's password and sends a temporary one via email.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If an error occurs while sending the email.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(ChangePasswordRequest request)
      Changes the user's password after verifying the old one.
      Parameters:
      request - Object containing username, old password and new password.
